item.title: Setting Up a Azure Function and Use PnP PowerShell
item.description: What is an Azure function? An Azure Function is a serverless compute service that allows you to run small pieces of code without having to worry about the infrastructure. You can use Azure Functions to trigger code on a schedule, respond to events, or connect to other services. What is PnP PowerShell? PnP PowerShell is a set of PowerShell cmdlets that allow you to interact with SharePoint Online and Microsoft 365.
